pages.text: $(li)Crossbow, as the Bows, let you fire Arrows that you have in your inventory.$(br)$(li)To use it, you have to load the ammunition right clicking while you are holding the Crossbow on your hand.

pages.name: Crossbow
pages.text: Crossbows accepts Fireworks and Arrows as ammunition.
$(li)Once charged, you can just right click again while you are holding the Crossbow to shoot.$(br)$(li)This weapon has less range than Bows but inflicts more damage than this last one.
